items.content_html:
Your Fastest Route to Algorithms & Data Structures (JavaScript ES6)

In less than 100 pages, you will explore key concepts, learn how to implement algorithms, and understand the importance of data structures in JavaScript. Each topic is presented in a straightforward manner, focusing on practical applications and real-world examples to enhance your understanding. By the end of this book, you will have a solid foundation in algorithms and data structures, empowering you to apply these concepts effectively in your JavaScript projects. Let's embark on this fast-paced journey to mastering algorithms and data structures in JavaScript ES6.

Get your copy

What’s inside

Welcome to "Your Fastest Route to Algorithms & Data Structures (JavaScript ES6)". This concise guide is designed to be your quick and practical companion in mastering essential algorithms and data structures using JavaScript ES6.

  • JavaScript ES6 Prerequisites for Data Structures and Algorithms.
  • Big-O Notation and Complexity Analysis.
  • Recursion and Recursive Programming.
  • Arrays.
  • Stacks
  • Queues.
  • Linked Lists.
  • And lot more.

About the author

Adegoke Akintoye is a techpreneur and author with a B.Tech. in Physics with Electronics. He has expertise in software development, embedded systems, and electronic system design. Adegoke's entrepreneurial spirit and technical acumen drive innovation and create impactful solutions. He is married with children and lives in Ota, Ogun State.

Ready to build real APIs?

Start your journey today — get hands-on with Laravel and the tooling used by professionals.

items.title: API Development with Laravel
items.summary: API Development with Laravel: A Quick Start Guide A project-based book that introduces you to Laravel, even if you’re completely new to it — and shows you how to build a Payment Processor API step by step. This book is a hands-on, project-based guide designed…
items.content_html:
API Development with Laravel: A Quick Start Guide

A project-based book that introduces you to Laravel, even if you’re completely new to it — and shows you how to build a Payment Processor API step by step.

Get your copy

What’s inside

This book is a hands-on, project-based guide designed to help you quickly get started with Laravel API development. You’ll build real application and learn how to integrate essential tools used in modern backend development.

  • Introduction to RESTfull API.
  • Introduction to Laravel.
  • Implement authentication, validation, routing, webhook etc.
  • Test endpoints with EchoAPI, and MailHog.
  • Deploy seamlessly using CapRover
  • Document your API with Scramble.
  • Build a Payment Processor API.
  • And lot more.

About the author

Adegoke Akintoye is a techpreneur and author with a B.Tech. in Physics with Electronics. He has expertise in software development, embedded systems, and electronic system design. Adegoke's entrepreneurial spirit and technical acumen drive innovation and create impactful solutions. He is married with children and lives in Ota, Ogun State.

Ready to build real APIs?

Start your journey today — get hands-on with Laravel and the tooling used by professionals.
